summary: The @types/long stub types definition is unnecessarily listed as a dependency in @temporalio/client's package.json. Since long v5 includes its own types, this @types package should be removed from dependencies and moved to devDependencies if needed.
userImpact: Users installing @temporalio/client unnecessarily receive an obsolete type definition package, increasing bundle size and causing deprecation warnings.
rootCause: The @types/long stub was required for type definitions in earlier versions of the long library, but long v5 includes native type definitions making the stub unnecessary.
proposedFix: Remove @types/long from dependencies in packages/client/package.json since long v5 provides its own types.
resolutionDetails: The deprecated @types/long dependency was removed from the client package as long v5 includes native type definitions.
keyQuote: it can be removed since v5 of `long`
